text: It’s tailored for mass market stuff - but I still think it is valuable for JuliaCon speakers.

text: thanks for your input, sure let me stew on a good solid message. Maybe introduce the area of study. My field is basically dead/or dying and has almost been completely invaded by commercial opportunists in the US(my advisor retired and there's maybe 1 or 2 others teaching it correctly). So maybe this could breath a little life into it. Thank you
